text: Ibudhou Marjing is the God of northeast direction in Manipuri mythology. He is the God who invented the game of polo.http://manipuri.itgo.com/the_lais.html#marjing According to legend, Lord Marjing dwells in the hilltop of Heingang village.https://elle.in/article/manipur-polo- women/https://www.magzter.com/article/Fashion/Elle-India/Riding-Up-A-Storm In the Heingang hilltop, the Meitei people often worship the deity, lighting the candles before the onset of the polo game.http://e-pao.net/epSubPageExtractor.asp?src=news_section.News_Links.News_Links_2019.Manipur_female_polo_players_are_riding_up_a_storm_20190323 Lord Marjing is included in the Manipuri Polo mythology.https://www.lapolo.in/blog/manipuri-mythology-polo/ ==References == Category:Names of God in Sanamahism
title: Ibudhou Marjing
